Posts.Content: Hi I'm new here ,  Ive had trouble locating ,sarcoma   so please excuse me jumping in here ,as its the only place Ive found. the word, mine is angio .sarcoma, sited on the breast  I had a lumpectomy done 7 years ago,  Have to say dont like looking dowm a menu, of every kind of Cancer, I would however be pleased to get futher advice on it , I have just undergone a second surgery , in three months to remove its spead ,I am to be seen shortly at the Royal Marsden  thank you for reading
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast

Posts.Content: Hello Dream thief thank you for replying , I will  deffinatly have a look at the groups, although the surgeon has been ,more than helpful explaing evey thing, you can't have enough back up information, especially from those who have had similar,   she did explain to me ,how the angio Sarcoma ,was from the radiotherapy I received in June 2011, I dont like to bandy this about ,as feel it could unnecessarily worry, those who are set to have it,   already Ive taken heart from others ,saying how tired they feel and rather low in spirit they feel, wish you a good Sunday  sewsandy xxx
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast

Posts.Content: Good morning Resa , its hard I know ,but dont over think , go with the flow , some day's are down days while others not too bad, either are not your choice ,and today I aim to take my.own advice ! wish you a good Sunday   sewsandy xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired and emotional
